long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Manager for Atlassian is a Chrome extension by BDQ designed to streamline your workflow by organizing and managing multiple Atlassian tabs efficiently. It allows you to quickly switch between Jira, Confluence, and other Atlassian products, reducing tab clutter and improving productivity, highlighting production instances to avoid mistakes. Ideal for teams and individuals working across multiple Atlassian platforms.

BDQ is an Atlassian Solution Partner.

We provide consultancy, training, App development and integrations for Atlassian products such as Jira and Confluence. You can find us here at www.bdq.cloud, or contact us at enquiries@bdq.cloud
